title: New Client
body: Since the new client came out i allways pick that option «launch legacy client», because i was getting punished by not acepting matchs, not picking/banning, taking worng masteries/runes/spells. The new client lags to much to me and now I can´t open the old one because i press that opton and the clent just shutdown and then nothing happens until i open it again and this happen over and over again.

replies.body:
Hmmm... Try launching the **lol.launcher.admin.exe** file from inside your league directory (C:\Riot Games) to see if anything changes. Additionally, launching it as admin (right-click, run as admin) may help as well.

Let me know if this got you back into the Legacy Client.
